Uses of Class
com.chuchro.ucbx.javax4362.craps.Bet

Uses of Bet in com.chuchro.ucbx.javax4362.craps
 

Subclasses of Bet in com.chuchro.ucbx.javax4362.craps
 class ComeLineBet
          A Come Line bet is essentially the same as a Pass Line bet, except for the fact that the Come Line bet is made after the point is rolled.
 class DontComeBet
          Don't Come bet for the subsequent rolls of a craps game.
 class DontOddsBet
          DontOddsBet is similar to a OddsBet, except that it's attached to a DontPassBet or DontComeBet.
 class DontPassBet
          Don't Pass bet for the come out roll of a craps game.
 class LineBet
          This abstract class represents all types of bets that may require multiple rolls to be determined.
 class LineOddsBet
          Odds bet for the a pass line bet or a come line bet.
 class OddsBet
          An OddsBet is attached to any LineBet type and is (optionally) set after the point of the line bet is set.
 class PassLineBet
          Pass Line bet for the come out roll of a craps game.
 class PlaceBet
          A Place bet is on one of the six field numbers and wins if that number is rolled before a seven (7) is rolled.
 class PropositionBet
          A Proposition bet is on one roll bet that wins only one of the winning point is rolled on the subsequent roll.
 

Fields in com.chuchro.ucbx.javax4362.craps with type parameters of type Bet
private  java.util.List<Bet> Session.bets
          A collection of all of the bets the player has made.
